img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 59.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/50/Wukong_MiddleHollow_59.jpg)
However, the monster has a few new moves you'll need to worry about, like being able to stab down with its front legs.
img_below_text:
If you notice the monster begin to rise up to where you can't hit it with normal swings, back off and get ready, as it will likely try to punch you with its "right hand" slamming through under its body. The good news is the hand is also another target in addition to its head, giving you more places to swing your staff at.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 63.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/79/Wukong_MiddleHollow_63.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 59 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MiddleHollow 59.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/50/Wukong_MiddleHollow_59.jpg)
However, the monster has a few new moves you'll need to worry about, like being able to stab down with its front legs."
            - Following Text: "If you notice the monster begin to rise up to where you can't hit it with normal swings, back off and get ready, as it will likely try to punch you with its "right hand" slamming through under its body. The good news is the hand is also another target in addition to its head, giving you more places to swing your staff at.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 63.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/79/Wukong_MiddleHollow_63.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist faces a large, spider-like monster in a dimly lit cave. The monster is shown preparing to attack with its front legs and "right hand," which can be targeted by the player. The image serves to illustrate the monster's new attack moves and the player's strategy to counter them by hitting the hand and head.
